__e: You might not know this about me, But I am a bit of a shutterbug.
Look, if this was accidental maybe one of the guys in your crew has an itchy finger we can help.
I accidentally shoot a couple of shots...
Because I can't stop my finger from pulling the trigger. And I'm praying for him to blink. I'm praying for him to twitch.
And by messy I mean my two friends will pull their triggers, and then we'll have blood and brains all over this beautiful table.
Not while I have strength in my finger, to squeeze the trigger, and shoot you with the truth between the eyes.
